ygData.subject: (no subject)
ygData.msgSnippet: I have a guild member with a skill in Fletching of 162.  Out of 9 attempts, he has made 2 bows.  They are tough! snip
ygData.messageBody:
I have a guild member with a skill in Fletching of 162. Out of 9 attempts, he
has made 2 bows. They are tough!


snip
<<Another thing, has anyone here successfully made a trueshot longbow yet? I'm
trying to get a good idea of the relative difficulty of this bow, and, if you've
been able to make it, please post your skill level and the nuber of attempts it
took (or even if you've tried, but not made it, post how many times you've
failed). I'll start. I am skill 140, and I've failed 10 times, no success.>>
